content.text:
# Draft:Monument to the Friendship between Nukufetau and Nanumea

----
The Monument to the Friendship between Nukufetau and Nanumea is a small stone structure located in Tuvalu inscribed with an image of a handshake and the words: "NANUMEA NUKUFETAU 24th ME 1890 - 1990 TAUMEANA." It is located on the inhabited Savave islet of the Nukufetau atoll, in the courtyard of a church called Siona Fou. It was constructed to symbolize the bond and collaboration between the Nukufetau and Nanumea atolls. There is an identical monument outside the Chetverkin's Church in Nanumea. Both monument's are near their community's maneapa.
